claim: Figure 1 shows a general structural formula for E472a.
title: Figure 1.
caption: General structural formula for E 472a: where at least one of R1, R2 or R3 represents an acetyl moiety and a fatty acyl moiety and the remaining position has either an acetyl moiety or fatty acyl moiety or hydrogen

claim: Figure 2 shows a general structural formula for E472b.
title: Figure 2.
caption: General structural formula for E 472b: where at least one of R1, R2 or R3 represents a lactyl moiety and a fatty acyl moiety and the remainder position has either a lactyl moiety or fatty acyl moiety or hydrogen

claim: Figure 3 shows a general structural formula for E472c.
title: Figure 3.
caption: General structural formula for E 472c: where at least one of R1, R2 or R3 represents a citryl moiety and a fatty acyl moiety and the remaining position has either a citryl moiety or fatty acyl moiety or hydrogen

claim: Figure 4 shows a general structural formula for E472d.
title: Figure 4.
caption: General structural formula for E 472d: where at least one of R1, R2 or R3 represents a tartaryl moiety and a fatty acyl moiety and the remaining position has either a tartaryl moiety or fatty acyl moiety or hydrogen

claim: As an example, the general structural formula of diacetyltartaric acid esters of mono glycerides only of fatty acids is shown in Figure 5.
title: Figure 5.
caption: General structural formula for E 472e: where at least one of R1, R2 or R3 represents a monoacetyltartaryl moiety or diacetyltartaryl moiety and a fatty acyl moiety and the remaining position has either a monoacetyltartaryl moiety or diacetyltartaryl moiety or fatty acyl moiety or hydrogen but also acetyl moiety or tartaryl moiety
